TheWord.Title: If I asked You how-to dance will You dance with Me, if I asked You how-to play will You play with Me.

Dream.Commentary: Woman in cream veil. Girl in cream gown.

Remember.Commentary: Ati fun iwe. When You stand praying, forgive, if You have ought against any: that Your Father also which is in heaven may forgive You Your trespasses (Mark 11:25).
Remember.ScriptureReference: 1 Samuel 25:28, 1 Kings 8:30, 2 Chronicles 6:39, 2 Chronicles 7:14, Mark 11:25, Acts 8:22, James 5:15
